title: Family No.1
content:
Family no.1... this was a daily soap that used to come on one of the tv channels...well that's just a lame statement justifying the title...but actually this post is about the family ties n bonds that we share....an assimilation of sweet and sour feelings which is forever cherished and which makes life like "LIFE"...

 

Well i am writing this post the festivities of Eid, Ganesh Chaturthi and teeja...and these two days have been awesome...happy....festive...joyous...it really feels like if you have your family supporting you, guiding you or just being by your side...any damn storm can't take a toll of you ever....

We had so much fun...n the best part the pool lunches and dinner...(kudos to the mistresses of spices and sweets around me!!!)....you talk about insane things like the spelling of swipe and you talk over family issues ...you have happiness bubbling around you...it just is brilliant...i'm really lucky that i have such a wondrous family with cheerful funny people...and its really great that we have these festive occasions and birthdays anniversaries and others as an alibi to be together irrespective of our monotonously busy and strict schedules....and all the gratitude to God that he let me be born in India!!!

 

India works really fine for me...

I love my India...and I love my family...

courtesy: Parul Kaushik

recommendations.title: Pakistani F-16 Pilot Dies After His Own Countrymen Lynched Him On Suspicion Of Being An Indian
recommendations.content: The Pakistani pilot whose F-16 was shot down by Wing Commander Abhinandan Varthman, has succumbed to his injuries inflicted by his own countrymen. recommendations.title: Being Human !!!
recommendations.content:
Before I have my say, I want to ask u something... Why is it that today we have to get horrendously logical even when we want to help somebody??? isn't humanity still alive??? why not...

ARE WE STILL HUMAN???
